name: The Exodus
description:
SUMMARY:


This is an old-school 2D RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes.

The Rebellion was a great war waged against the King and his former Council Members, who betrayed him in the attempt to form and rule over a new nation. After years of bloodshed, the King won the war and exiled his enemies.
In what is known as The Exile Island, the Sentinels, a group of specifically trained warriors guard over the Underworld Prison that hold The Exiled. Circumstances calls them to uphold their vows and duty when The Exiled escape the prison.
Now the Sentinels must chase them over the Island before they can escape it.

FEATURES:


Fast paced and thrilling gameplay
Mouse Support
Quest Journal
Outstanding Artwork
Beautiful visuals
Exciting soundtrack
